Data Fields

struct mutex nrs_mutex
 Protects nrs_core::nrs_policies, serializes external policy registration/unregistration, and NRS core lprocfs operations.

 List of all policy descriptors registered with NRS core; protected by nrs_core::nrs_mutex.

NRS core object.

Holds NRS core fields.
